subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Lacey spent most of his 13 pro seasons with the Cincinnati Royals and the Kansas City Kings, after leading New Mexico State deep into the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Lacey spent most of his 13 pro seasons with the Cincinnati Royals and the Kansas City Kings, after leading New Mexico State deep into the N.C.A.A. tournament.
